text:
1
ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
Our thanks to Mr. Robert H= Lee and Mr= George C. Johnson,
of the Radio Department, for assistance in preparing the
questions used, and to Mr Lee for helping in the prepay-
ration of instructions, and student assignments; to our
many fine students for their patient and careful calls and
reports; to the cooperative public for taking time to
answer our questions; and to Miss Georgabell Henley for
the many hours of arranging and checking tabulations with
us.
H, J= Skornia
March 15, 1948
